channel.title: Comments on: Saying good-bye to Facebook

item.title: By: Axel Segebrecht
item.dc:creator: Axel Segebrecht
item.description: Hey Andrew, I have found that Twitter works well for me and can understand how it may not for others. I think itâ€™s about trying to conciously moderate the consumption while balancing mental health with participating in public discourse :)

item.title: By: Andrew Montague
item.dc:creator: Andrew Montague
item.description: A post-Facebook existance is very tempting... But you're wrong about Twitter, it"s everthing that is wrong with social media and so much more.
item.content:encoded: A post-Facebook existance is very tempting… But you’re wrong about Twitter, it”s everthing that is wrong with social media and so much more.
